subject: Re: [junit] Help, can test cases be retrieved from the package they are in?
msgSnippet: Jeff, You can try something like this and you should be able to pick up all classes ending with Test in a particular directory.
messageBody:
Jeff,

You can try something like this and you should be able to pick up all
classes ending with Test in a particular directory.

<junit showoutput="true" printsummary="true">
<formatter type="xml" usefile="yes"/>
<batchtest>
<fileset dir="${junit.classes.path}" >
<include name="**/*Test.class"/>
</fileset>
</batchtest>
<classpath location="${junit.base.path}/jar/wsm-junit.jar"/>
<classpath refid="unittest.classpath"/>
</junit>

Hope that helps,
Harshal
